content:
Russian troops attacked the drone a civilian car in the village of Cossack Kherson region.

About thisinformsKherson Ova.

“A 74-year-old man was injured in explosion. He suffered an explosive injury and a leg injury, ”the message said.

As it is noted, the victim was provided with medical care, he refused hospitalization.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Nikolaev as a result of the impact of the Russian FederationA person was killed, four more were injured.
title: In the Kherson region, the army of the Russian Federation dropped explosives on a civilian car: there is a wounded
description: The Kherson Ova informs about it. “As a result of dumping explosives ...
author: Army Inform
